REWARDS_HELP_DESCRIPTION: Change settings for rewards earned upon leveling up.
REWARDS_HELP_USAGE: Set role to be given when a member reaches the specified level.```/rewards add <level> <role>```
Remove role from be given at a specified level.```/rewards remove <level>```
Set roles to be stacked or replaced after gaining new role.```/rewards stack <enable/disable>```
Shows all roles set to levels.```/rewards show```
REWARDS_SUCCESS: Members will now gain role %s at level `%s`.
REWARDS_NOT_EXISTS: Unable to find a reward for level %s.
REWARDS_REMOVED: Members will no longer gain a role at level `%s`.
REWARDS_LIMIT: Too many roles have been set up. Currently only 30 role rewards can be setup.
